7932b94d-dff3-4fff-b4f2-2fbb4ec99c7b.description: The Certified Value Analysis Healthcare Professional (CVAHP) is the industry-leading professional board certification for healthcare value analysis professionals. This certification is open to those healthcare professionals that meet all eligibility requirements, successfully pass the board certification exam, and then meet all requirements necessary for recertification every three (3) years. The CVAHP credential is issued by the AHVAP Certification Center.
7932b94d-dff3-4fff-b4f2-2fbb4ec99c7b.name: Certified Value Analysis Healthcare Professional (CVAHP)

issuer.summary: issued by Association of Healthcare Value Analysis Professionals Certification Center

entity.name: Association of Healthcare Value Analysis Professionals Certification Center

alignments.name: Recertification by Exam
alignments.description: Currently certified professionals can recertify their CVAHP credential by taking the board examination again and earning a passing score.

alignments.name: Recertification by Continuing Education (CE)
alignments.description: Currently certified professionals can recertify their CVAHP credential by successfully submitting forty-five (45) hours of approved continuing education directly related to value analysis and the domains of Governance and Structure, Healthcare Value Analysis Methodology, Professionalism and Business Ethics, and Finance.

badge_template_activities.title: Three (3) years of cumulative experience in a Value Analysis Role
Two (2) years of formal post-secondary education

Candidates must successfully pass a board certification examination consisting of 110 questions covering the domains of Governance and Structure, Healthcare Value Analysis Methodology, Professionalism and Business Ethics, and Finance.
